typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cur_code2 as string,
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> preDimCurrency
source(output(
		agt_description as string,
		agt_key as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		top_key as string,
		top_description as string,
		agt_top_key as string,
		dimKey as long,
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		from_currency_code as string,
		exchange_rate as decimal(12,2),
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updatet_by as string,
		top_code as string,
		Dim_key as long,
		sou_key as string,
		sou_description as string,
		dim_key as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> dimCurrencyInput
preDimCurrency derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Currencies') ~> DeriveTopLevel
dimCurrencyInput aggregate(maxKey = max(Dim_key)) ~> MaxExistingDimKey
DeriveHashed, SelectExisintgHash lookup(hashedValues == existingHash,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupExisting
dimCurrencyInput derive(existingHash = sha1(cur_code,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> ExistingHashed
DeriveTopLevel derive(hashedValues = sha1(cur_code,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> DeriveHashed
ExistingHashed select(mapColumn(
		existingHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExisintgHash
LookupExisting sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_currency.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrencyInsert
